caption: I LOVE Salata!! The food is fresh and delicious, the price and the amount of food is unbeatable, and the staff is very friendly and professional. Timothy ALWAYS is positive and makes my visit enjoyable.
Great service and selection, price on the high side but worth it!
Great location - always the most fresh ingredients. Friendly staff and management.
Great little place.  I love the options.  I would suggest going there first as opposed to ordering online as your first time.  They offer more options on site than online. The turkey was delicious.

This has had to be the worse possible experience I have ever had being a customer and an employee of salata! They won’t even call me back so I can get my w-2 and never called me back after corona happened and every time I would call the manager now who is don could never ever give me any answer always an excuse of well I haven’t been let into the manager system so I can’t help you!!?? He never would give me another phone number to call and he was just plainly unhelpful or even concerned about my issue! Like I don’t even want to work there anymore I just need my w-2 to file my taxes and he can’t even help me with that! This company is utter trash to management and how they handle situations even during a pandemic!! So if some one could please just help me get my tax information so I can move on with my life would be absolutely god sent!

This was my fourth salata experience. It was clean the staff was ok. They were out of honey mustard unfortunately. The lady that fixed my salad was a little stingy only giving me a spoon full of everything. At other locations they at least do two unless a person says otherwise.

I rarely give bad reviews, but the vegetable soup is consistently and annoyingly overwhelmed with Irish potatoes which distort the taste and absorbs the liquid in the broth. This is also a problem with the Johns Creek store. I have requested that this be reduced but was informed that it would not be possible. aa the entire pot is prepared that way. Not everyone eats or is able to consume Irish potatoes.  Please respect your vegetarian customers who do not have as many options on the menu, and do a better job. Otherwise, change the name of the item to bland potato soup. With a little effort, this problem could be rectified.
Horrendous service and a filthy location. They were out of product and didn’t seem to care. This place is an embarrassment. I’ll never go back and neither will my friends.

I had an amazing salad there. Expensive but worth it I thought. Chicken protein. Only thing I had eaten that day so I know it's the only culprit. Got sick sick to my stomach with food poison. Might need to check the quality control of product.

Wonderful place for a quick working lunch round the corner from the office. Extensive spread; get spoilt with the choices you have to build your own salad. The salad was fresh. The portions were very generous - could fill you up even on hungry days. Parking is no issue. But getting out on the street and trying to drive North could be tricky
Great concept and product.  Clean and well kept. Great value and hearty portions.

I tried this place for the first time today because my sister has not stopped raving about it. I kid you not, this is the best salad I’ve had in my entire life! It was so good, my two year old devoured it, when usually she’s a picky eater.  Not only is the food fresh and phenomenal, every employee was so nice and personable too. I can’t even try to find a negative comment about this place. I’ve already recommend it to all of my friends and see myself there a lot In the near future.
Really good, great options and plentiful servings.
Excellent Salata location! Clean and spotless! All the vegetables and ingredients were super fresh and delicious! A+

Man oh man ,I am pregnant and I been dying to eat food cause of my nauseousness and I tried this place first time today and can I say wow! My nauseousness went away after eating here! And the food is yummy! You get all you want on a salad for so cheap! I had a veggie salad with no meat, cup of tomato soup and a peanut butter cookie. I ate it and was so full I fell asleep instantly LOL! Staff was cool! Will most definitely be coming back often!
I’ve never paid $18 for a salad but will say it was worth it. Got the regular (largest size) with 2 meats. Very tasty and actually pretty filling.
Amazing
The best salad concept ever!!!
Fresh salad. Decent price.
The best salad fresh in the world
Don who was the best and the food was fresh and delicious. We will definitely be coming back
Amazing! Great service, great food! Will be back!
Awesome and amazing service! Food is fresh and we'll prepared!!! Don is an incredible leader.... and empowers his team!!!
Wonderful selection for building a personal salad.  Good to see lots of guests walking in with masks, and all the staff.  Friendly people too!!

An awesome salad place with the most friendly and welcoming owner. It's more like a create your own salad so you can either make your most weird salad or the tastiest. But ingredients are never old. They always taste fresh everytime Ive eaten there.
(Translated by Google) Exquisite salads, excellent service.  (Original) Exquisitas ensaladas, excelente atención.
Fresh and tasty salad for a fair price! We placed an online order for pick-up and the order was correct and ready on-time. We will definitely return!
10/10 salad. Runs a bit on the pricier side depending on what you add on, but it is totally worth it. Good quality food with a broad selection. Fresh, fast, and healthy.

Hands down, recommend 11/10, freshly salads and wraps. Bit pricey but overall the best salad I have ever experienced, excellent staff especially the old guy who rings the order he got the excellent service, Loved it!

If y’all love salad.   This is the place.  It’s a bit pricey too.  Everything is fresh and soup is homemade daily .  proteins will knock the check up some.  They serve in aluminum mixing-like bowls(small/large) Was so full had no room for the bread. Location is tucked away in a center close to Avalon. By suntrust bank and Verizon .  We ate inside and only request is that we disliked the plastic ware.  Now with sweet tomatoes prolly will not re-open this is a viable option. If you are looking for a different spin on the salad bar. Check out Salata salad.
Pleasantly surprised by the meal I received.  Everything was fresh and tasty.  It's a great healthy option instead of fast food.
Friendly staff, good and healthy food, and a comfortable and clean and attractive place - a superb spot to eat at!
This is a jewel.  Everything it's fresh,  and the selection is great. I went away lunch and was able to gey through the line in less than 5 minutes.   Very reasonably priced for high quality food.
Great fresh salads with many options.
First time here and wow, this place is amazing.   It's build your own salad with so many variations.
Great tasting salads and service.
I would definitely recommend this place,they have plenty of toppings and the feed you out of huge bowls lol definitely worth the money
Lots of salad, lots of toppings, lots of tea, not a lot of price. 👍👍👍👍👍
Fantastic!! I’m a salad lover and this place is heaven!
Best salad I’ve ever had!
Visited first time today for lunch.. very nice ambiance, build your own salads with lots of  options.. Will definitely refer to friends and visit again !!
Great food Good prices
I like this place a lot, however I went today around 1pm to have lunch and there were a blonde guy in the line of service who was very rude.

Today, I was felt not welcomed. Terrible service- not only from one but all employees who helped me. It was not so happy experience overall. To go salad was given without fork and knife. I will think twice before stepping in.

Fantastic spot - had to stop by the Verizon store right next to it and came in for a quick bite. It is "build your own" style sort of like a chipotle. Tons and tons of options - from fruit to meats to all different types of veggies like sun dried tomatoes, etc.  Not in the Avalon but right next to it! Definitely coming back here often!
Very busy location during the lunch rush. Staff behind the counter was very friendly. Plenty of options to pick from to make your perfect salad. Priced well. Would definitely come back.

I absolutely loved this place. Fresh, healthy food with lots of yummy choices. Great value as well. Sparkling clean, including the bathroom. I liked it so much I inquired about franchise opportunities! I will definitely go back.
Great place to get a salad! All the ingredients are SUPER fresh! I loved the little multli-grain croissant that comes with the salad and their tomato basil soup was delicious!!!
Amazing food for only $7. The "small salad" is plenty to eat. My favorite vegetarian / vegan place near Avalon. Great to dine in or get it to-go.

Too frequent visiting this place and the workers are not being available to serve customers. Stood at the counter for 4 minutes and no workers were behind the line counter or anywhere visible within the restaurant. Not a good way to run a business.

Great concept but unfortunately not the best. They are new, so they have time to improve. But the service is horrible, the employees havent been trained well. And the protein options look dry and like they have sat out all day. They also were out of tomatoes. How does a salad place NOT have tomatoes?!

I absolutely love this place and always have a good experience with the employees, but can't understand why they are consistently out of cilantro. I understand that sometimes it happens, but I used to go at least once per week and the majority of the time they don't have cilantro. I spoke to the manager once after finding out that they had some in the back but no one wanted to prepare it so they could have it available. I stopped in yesterday and there was no cilantro so I left without getting anything. I love that there are plenty of ingredient options, but cilantro is a favorite of mine and for the cost, I'd like to have all of the ingredients that I want.
Wasn't expecting much because I have tried other salad places and was not impressed. I was impressed. Professional staff, clean tables and very good food.
Healthy options and very friendly service makes this a regular spot.

I have been going here for lunch since it opened.  I usually get it to go.  But it is officially my favorite lunch place. The ingredients are all fresh and I dearly love the fresh herb vinaigrette dressing and the Pesto chicken.  The employees are all very accommodating and friendly.  The best part is there loyalty program rocks.  As a picky eater this is made for me to pick what you want as you go down the line.  It it often busy at lunch but well worth the wait.  If you love salad this is the place for you!
Great salads, very clean would definitely go again.
Hooked on salata.
Delicious and great customer service!
Delicious salads and dressings and the pita chips OH MY!
Great selection
Freshest salad bar ever experienced
Delicious, healthy options for vegans and meat eaters alike!
Convenient location, and refreshingly healthy. My co-workers love it!
Good food chicken are made in cube that are way to THICC for me to handle. Please make smaller cubes
Nice place for lunch, nothing fancy but fresh salads, good selection, and for a very reasonable price.

This is a great spot and great selection however customer service can be better. The manager or owner , African American lady,  can be more poised when addressing issues. Initial protein offered to me was small and I requested a bit more, the gentleman that assisted was heavy handed and gave me a surplus. She corrected the employee amidst everyone and proceeded to insinuate I can pay for double protein if one serving was not enough. Her tone, her mannerism and attitude was off and her her point could have been made in a different manner.

This is a new place for us and we are excited to put this on the top of our list what really made our experience is the customer service from the two ladies that were there Kelly and lajohn. The food is fresh the place is clean some say that the price is a little high but you get a lot for what you pay for.  Me and the family are back in the area and had to stop at salata . We love this place . Thanks guys .this time sandra was the one to help us and she was amazing.  Thank you sandra for making our experience a great one .

This is a fantastic spot if you're looking for a good salad with LOTS of topping options. The regular salad ends up being quite large, but for only a dollar more than small it's a good deal. They're somewhat sparing with their topping portions, but with all the options you can customize to your heart's content!
Huge portion sizes! Perfect for vegans!
Great salads, highly recommend!
Great place to grab a nice fresh salad
Nice place to eat a salad. The salad was awesome.
Good salad, lots of options for a good price. Great customer service.
Fresh, fresh, and really fresh salads! Hands down, our favorite place to get a fabulous salad that is a meal! Great, friendly staff, clean and delicious every visit!

(Translated by Google) I love the place your customer service is very good especially that of Alpharetta  (Original) Me encanta el lugar su atención al cliente es muy buena especialmente la de Alpharetta
Awesome place to eat. It's very very clean and the staff is wonderful! I walked in, and I was greeted with genuine smiles! I'm definitely going there again!

One of my favorite places to grab something on the go that is still healthy. I've been going here since they opened and the service has always been great. Salata always has a lovely atmosphere and provides great customer service.

This place is my go-to for salads. It's fantastic and well priced for the amount of food you get! Such a vast selection of vegetables, proteins, and dressings. Everything is always so fresh too. If you're looking for a healthy option for lunch you should definitely try this spot.  Highly recommended.
Good food, good service.
The food is fresh and the customer service was great!
Best Salad place in Alpharetta. The taste is what you make out of it.
Great customer service
Awesome food
Excellent different lunch option.  Salad is very fresh and reasonably priced for what you get.  Will be back.

I love the diverse variety of foods that are available! So fresh, so healthy, and very filling. The service is exceptional because they're always willing to answer questions, give samples and are patient. However, I do have some suggestions. Along with the theme of healthy living, I think they should also implement some environment-healthy options for containers, utensils and straws. It just makes sense for a place like this to offer metal utensils for customers eating in and they can be washed and reused. Additionally, there can also be an option for paper straws, (balsa, i think ) wood utensils, and paper storage containers. I feel as if it might be a good and green change if they started reducing their unnecessary plastic usage.
Best salad spot period.

My husband dragged me here. He's been wanting me to go here for dinner for a while, but I always thought salad was better for a small lunch... but I was wrong! We rushed in an hour before closing, but the food was still super fresh and the young lady behind the counter was so nice and funny. It was refreshing!
Very great service, very nice people 😊
I loved this place for the simple, fresh and healthy concept and fair price , Bad I didn’t find it before
Super slow service for online orders. Need wait up to 40 minutes after promise time .
The king of salad eateries. Just getting a salad? You have found your new salad joint
The food looks so Heavenly oh and it taste so great
Great salad bar with a huge selection of fresh choices. Very friendly staff. Fast service. No wait.
Love this place! The food is great and the staff is always incredibly friendly.
Awesome spot, clean and fast?

Pricey but still a GOOD value, by the time you get to the end you'll have more salad than you can handle. Fresh ingredients, tasty toppings and a good selection on dressings (if you must). This salad DOES NOT need any protein! It's dense enough in flavor and umami to stand on its own.
Reasonably priced, great service, fresh food.  I couldn't ask for more!
Healthy delicious eating.  Friendly and patient staff especially for first timers.  @Salata please consider a compositing disposal.
Very good.  Must go back
Awesome and clean
If you really like salads, you'll love this place! Be prepared to wait if you go during busy lunchtime, though! The line is usually long for their handmade salads.
Great food, reasonably priced and a well trained friendly staff.
It's like Subway but with salads. Lots of options and tastes great.

Disneyworld but with salad ingredients. If you like salad this is your place. There is no other meal options besides salad (and wraps, which are the same thing but with a wrap) so keep that in mind when you go.
Great salad but some of the worst customer service I've experienced.

Oh my gosh. I wish there were more locations across the Atlanta area. The salads are delicious. The ingredients were super fresh. The meat was seasoned well. There were tons of dressing! The customer service was on point! Definitely going back.
The best salad ever. I would eat there every day if I could

This place is great if you love salads. Lots of toppings to choose from. The meat protein costs extra to add. My only complaint was cleanlyness.  For example, the person serving our salad had gloves on, but went into the back and touched door handles, etc without changing the gloves out.
You cannot beat the price for an awesome salad.  You pay for the bowl and put what you want in it.  It is but weighed at the end.
My co-worker and I go every week here. We love the salads there. We can have it the way we want it
Delicious. They didn’t have sunflower seeds but otherwise it was great.

Visited this location twice within the same week and both times some ingredients were extremely low or out. No one bothered to replenish the ingredients even though there were still hours left in the business day. Not the typical Salta experience I'm used to.
Amazing and beautiful place! This was my first time trying Salata and I am in LOVE! Very good customer service!
Great salad! Best anywhete
Very clean and quick service!
Large and filling fresh salads. Love it!
Great salad. Friendly staff. Crowded at lunchtime.
Great ingredients!
Excellent food and concept
Good custom salad options.

Thia place is incredible! My new favorite salad bar. Great variety if salads and ingredients all high quality produce. If you're a meat eater tona of great protein options and they also take care of the non meat eaters with some delicious options. Soups are great and the breads are good. They also have Tea in tap which I thought was great! Can't wait to go back!

This is a salad bar but prepared by the staff. You choose the size, the type of lettuce, all the toppings you want, and you can add protein for an additional charge. All of it is very good. The soups are very good as well. The staff is very friendly and helpful.
I love coming here for some good salads. The portion sizes are generous, and it is a great, healthy meal!

Salata has really transformed the expectations in Atlanta of what a good, clean, and healthy salad restaurant should be.  They offer a clean and inviting experience, with a plethora of options.  Their salads come in regular and large sizes, both of which are sufficient.  All toppings are unlimited and the meat, vegetables, and dressings all look freshly made and prepared.
Best salads ever👍😊 Love to eat here!! Great service and fantastic food ❣️

Quality ingredients and friendly service,  but I found it to be far too expensive for a salad ($14 with drink) that didn't include table service.   The iced tea was awful.   Most of my companions loved it.   I wasn't so much of a fan.
Good options for create your own style of salad. Service was quick.

Friendly, efficient staff and fresh, tasty, numerous salad ingredients. Price is a bit lower by comparison to other Avalon area offerings. Give the Tea Bar a try, too. There were 5-6 different teas and such. I had the Prickly Pear Limeade after being able to serve myself samples. Delicious!

Derrida did a wonderful job preparing my salad. She allowed me to sample the various dressing, which by the way are so good. The pesto chicken is my new favorite. My boyfriend and I shall return. Love it!
I could eat there every day. Everything is is so fresh

Love the place! Marcella, one of the employees, is always happy and ready to serve! Everything is healthy, clean, and delicious! Although be prepared to wait a while because most of the employees take a while to serve you
Yummy

It’s ridiculous to be this pleased with a salad but here I am. The most extensive salad bar I’ve ever seen, and everything was incredibly fresh. My favorite detail was the fact that the vinaigrette dressing was thick enough to actually stick to the salad, instead of just sliding off and pooling at the bottom of the bowl like others. It really made a difference when every bite was equally coated in dressing. If you really enjoy salad as much as I do, this place is very much worth it.
Great salad experience at a reasonable.
The herb vinaigrette was wonderful. Everything is fresh
Lots of choices and combinations.  Good portion sizes too.
Fresh food offerings in a clean modern environment with friendly helpful service.  We will go back again!

This place is A-mazing! Have lost 15lbs eating here every weekday for lunch. The place is clean, the food is clean and fresh and the staff is very polite and extremely courteous. Disagree with other review that a small salad and soup is $17. I get a large salad and 1 protein for $12. Very reasonable for clean food and someone to custom make it for you. Cheers!
Delicious options! So much food for a very reasonable price. The staff was friendly and the place is very clean. Will definitely go back again!

The small salad with cup of soup was $17. I could have been to Bite Restaurant and had full service with better ambiance and a much better salad.  It was fresh, but way more money than I want to spend waiting in line with a tray.

Great first experience at Salata! I had a salata mix salad with herb chicken and ginger lime dressing and a cup of tomato basil soup both were delicious! I also love the selection of tea both the raspberry lemonade and peach lemonade were great, sweet but not too sweet. Definitely worth checking out and I will absolutely go back soon!
Salata mix with turkey and fresh herb vinaigrette is really good. I'm not a big salad person, but I'll definitely be back. Excellent customer service and very clean .
I love this place! The food and the staff are fantastic and it is super clean. Great job to the management team,  you got this one right!

Excellent! Really fresh and great selection of salad ingredients. Service is excellent- friendly staff. Very clean inside. Overall well done. This area has needed one of these for a long time. Will definitely be back!

OMG! This place is AMAZING! I had a wrap with the southwestern tortilla, shrimp, spicy chicken chipotle chicken, and chipotle ranch (with lots of other toppings of course). All I can say is ... YUMMY!!! 😋 The chicken was well seasoned, the veggies were really fresh, and the dressing was spicy 🌶 (just like I like it)! The staff was super friendly also! Thanks guys. I’ll def be back!
Amazingly Fresh so many choices! Excellent friendly service! You will be so happy!
